LanguageData.DSU.Max.Desc: When this is enabled, the I/O port will stop taking items if either the stack is full, or the stack size is greater than or equal to X.
LanguageData.DSU.Min.Desc: When this is enabled, the I/O port will return the outputted item to the cargo platform if the item has less than X stack size. It will also only take items if there are enough items in storage to exceed the minimum.
LanguageData.DSU.IItemsTab.Label: {0} stacks total, showing {1} result(s)
LanguageData.DSU.IItemsTab.Label.Empty: There are currently no items stored
LanguageData.DSU.Reorganize.Desc: Re-register I/O ports, reorganize and re-stack items
LanguageData.DSU.Alert.LostLink.Label: DSU: port lost link
LanguageData.DSU.Alert.LostLink.Desc: Port lost link. You sould connect it to on if Digital Storage Unit.
